welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dollard-des-Ormeaux, where the charm of a small town meets the excitement of a big city! Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and delicious food, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for international flights, equipped with modern facilities and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Jean Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
